health-notes: Expand endpoint to check for database connection and other services.
developer_warning: Warning This is a developer page and has not been through user research

error.generic: You could not be logged in. Please try again later.
error.expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

header.feedback: This is a new service – your feedback will help us to improve it.

footer.copyright_notice: All content is available under the Open Government Licence v3.0, except where otherwise stated

homepage.title: Welcome to the StatsWales Beta
homepage.welcome: This is a test page for development from here you can do the following:
homepage.dataset_creation: Start a new dataset creation journey

start.title: Create a new dataset
start.p1: To create a new dataset, you'll need:
start.data-table: a data table containing data and references to all relevant dimensions
start.lookup-table: lookup tables for all relevant dimensions - using either common tables within this service or uploading them yourself
start.metadata: details about the dataset including description, quality and how the data was collected

title.heading: What is the title of the dataset?
title.appear: This title will appear on the StatsWales website
title.descriptive: It should be short, descriptive and unique
title.language: The title should be in English.  You'll be asked to provide a Welsh translation later

upload.title: Upload the data table
upload.note: The file should be in a CSV format

sources.heading: What does each column in the data table contain?

metadata.title: Title
metadata.update_frequency: How often the dataset is updated

publishing.when: When the dataset should be published

confirm.missing: You need to confirm or reject the uploaded file using the buttons at the end of the preview

session.current_dataset_missing: Current data set is missing from the session
session.current_revision_missing: Current revision is missing from the session
session.current_import_missing: Current import is missing from the session
session.no_sources_on_import: Current import has no sources present on it, was the CSV empty?

sources.unknowns_found: You need to tell us what each column contains
sources.multiple_datavalues: You can only specify one column as containing data values
sources.multiple_footnotes: You can only specify one column as containing notes
sources.dimension_creation_failed: Something went wrong trying to create the dimensions.  Please try again.

list.no_datasets: No datasets are currently listed in the database.  If you need help please reach out to a member of the development team.

display.no_dimensions: This dataset has not been completed with dimensions
display.no_revisions: This dataset has not been completed with revisions

preview.failed_to_get_preview: We were unable to generate a preview of the uploaded CSV.  Is this a valid CSV?
preview.remove_error: We were unable to remove your uploadded file from the server.  Something went wrong.  Please try again
preview.confirm_error: You need to confirm or reject the uploaded file using the buttons at the end of the preview

errors.blob_storage_errror: Unable to connect to Blob Storage Service
errors.dataset_missing: No dataset found with this ID

title.missing: Either a title was not entered or there is a problem.

errors.server_error: An unknown error occcured, please try again later
